hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT EBSP_ID, EBSP_QUICK_CODE, EBSP_SHIPPER_NO, EBSP_NAME_CN, EBSP_NAME_EN, EBSP_SHORT_NAME, EBSP_STATUS, EBSP_CONTACT, EBSP_CONTACT_TEL, EBSP_CONTACT_MOBILE, EBSP_CONTACT_EMAIL, EBSP_CONTACT_FAX, EBSP_EBLC_ZIP, EBSP_PM_CODE, EBSP_EBCU_NAME, EBSP_REQ_APPOINTMENT, EBSP_EBLC_LONGITUDE, EBSP_EBLC_LATITUDE, EBSP_SOURCE, EBSP_REMARK, EBSP_SUBSTR1, EBSP_SUBSTR2, EBSP_SUBSTR3, EBSP_SUBSTR4, EBSP_SUBSTR5, EBSP_SUBSTR6, EBSP_SUBSTR7, EBSP_SUBSTR8, EBSP_SUBDATE1, EBSP_SUBDATE2, EBSP_SUBDATE3, EBSP_SUBDATE4, EBSP_SUBDATE8, EBSP_SUBNUM1, EBSP_SUBNUM2, EBSP_SUBNUM3, EBSP.REC_VER, EBSP.CREATE_TIME, EBSP.CREATOR, EBSP.MODIFY_TIME, EBSP.MODIFIER, EBSP.REC_STATUS, EBSP_EBLC_DETAIL_ADDRESS, EBSP_IS_SITE, EBSP_SITE_CODE, EBSP_SITE_NAME, EBSP_TYPE, EBSP_BRANCH_CODE, EBSP_BRANCH_NAME, EBSP_UPSTREAM_CODE, EBSP_UPSTREAM_DETAIL_ADDRESS, EDI_STATUS, EBSP.COMPANY_CODE, EBSP.SITE_CODE, EB.EBLC_COUNTRY_CODE, EB.EBLC_COUNTRY_NAME, EB.EBLC_PROVINCE_NAME, EB.EBLC_PROVINCE_CODE, EB.EBLC_CITY_NAME, EB.EBLC_CITY_CODE, EB.EBLC_COUNTY_NAME, EB.EBLC_COUNTY_CODE, EB.EBLC_TOWN_CODE, EB.EBLC_TOWN_NAME, EB.EBLC_VILLAGE_CODE, EB.EBLC_VILLAGE_NAME, EB.EBLC_DETAIL_ADDRESS, EBSP.EBSP_EBLC_ADDRESS, EBSP.EBSP_EBLC_CODE, EBSP.EBSP_WAREHOUSE_CODE, EBSP.EBSP_IS_CONSIGNOR, EBSP.EBSP_IS_SHIPPER FROM EB_SHIPPER EBSP LEFT JOIN EB_LOCATION EB ON EBSP.EBSP_EBLC_CODE = EB.EBLC_CODE WHERE 1=1 <if !is_empty(ebspShipperNo,ebspNameCn,ebspContact,ebspEblcAddress)> and ( 1 = 2 << or EBSP.EBSP_SHIPPER_NO LIKE '%'||:ebspShipperNo||'%'>> << or EBSP.EBSP_NAME_CN LIKE '%'||:ebspNameCn||'%'>> << or EBSP.EBSP_CONTACT LIKE '%'||:ebspContact||'%'>> << or EBSP.EBSP_EBLC_ADDRESS LIKE '%'||:ebspEblcAddress||'%'>> ) </if> <<AND EBSP_ID LIKE :ebspId>> <<AND EBSP.EBSP_EBLC_DETAIL_ADDRESS IN (:ebspEblcDetailAddresss)>> <<AND EBSP.EBSP_SHIPPER_NO IN (:eoorShipperCode)>> <<AND EBSP_QUICK_CODE LIKE :ebspQuickCode>> <<AND EBSP_NAME_EN LIKE :ebspNameEn>> <<AND EBSP_SHORT_NAME LIKE :ebspShortName>> <<AND EBSP.EBSP_STATUS LIKE :ebspStatus>> <<AND EBSP_CONTACT_TEL LIKE :ebspContactTel>> <<AND EBSP_CONTACT_MOBILE LIKE :ebspContactMobile>> <<AND EBSP_CONTACT_EMAIL LIKE :ebspContactEmail>> <<AND EBSP_CONTACT_FAX LIKE :ebspContactFax>> <<AND EBSP_EBLC_ZIP LIKE :ebspEblcZip>> <<AND EBSP_PM_CODE LIKE :ebspPmCode>> <<AND EBSP_EBCU_NAME LIKE :ebspEbcuName>> <<AND EBSP_REQ_APPOINTMENT LIKE :ebspReqAppointment>> <<AND EBSP_EBLC_LONGITUDE LIKE :ebspEblcLongitude>> <<AND EBSP_EBLC_LATITUDE LIKE :ebspEblcLatitude>> <<AND EBSP_SOURCE LIKE :ebspSource>> <<AND EBSP_REMARK LIKE :ebspRemark>> <<AND EBSP_SUBSTR1 LIKE :ebspSubstr1>> <<AND EBSP_SUBSTR2 LIKE :ebspSubstr2>> <<AND EBSP_SUBSTR3 LIKE :ebspSubstr3>> <<AND EBSP_SUBSTR4 LIKE :ebspSubstr4>> <<AND EBSP_SUBSTR5 LIKE :ebspSubstr5>> <<AND EBSP_SUBSTR6 LIKE :ebspSubstr6>> <<AND EBSP_SUBSTR7 LIKE :ebspSubstr7>> <<AND EBSP_SUBSTR8 LIKE :ebspSubstr8>> <<AND EBSP_SUBDATE1 > :ebspSubdate1From>> <<AND EBSP_SUBDATE1 <= :ebspSubdate1To + 1>> <<AND EBSP_SUBDATE2 > :ebspSubdate2From>> <<AND EBSP_SUBDATE2 <= :ebspSubdate2To + 1>> <<AND EBSP_SUBDATE3 > :ebspSubdate3From>> <<AND EBSP_SUBDATE3 <= :ebspSubdate3To + 1>> <<AND EBSP_SUBDATE4 > :ebspSubdate4From>> <<AND EBSP_SUBDATE4 <= :ebspSubdate4To + 1>> <<AND EBSP_SUBDATE8 > :ebspSubdate8From>> <<AND EBSP_SUBDATE8 <= :ebspSubdate8To + 1>> <<AND EBSP_SUBNUM1 LIKE :ebspSubnum1>> <<AND EBSP_SUBNUM2 LIKE :ebspSubnum2>> <<AND REC_VER LIKE :recVer>> <<AND EBSP_SUBNUM3 LIKE :ebspSubnum3>> <<AND CREATE_TIME > :createTimeFrom>> <<AND CREATE_TIME <= :createTimeTo + 1>> <<AND CREATOR LIKE :creator>> <<AND MODIFY_TIME > :modifyTimeFrom>> <<AND MODIFY_TIME <= :modifyTimeTo + 1>> <<AND MODIFIER LIKE :modifier>> <<AND EBSP.REC_STATUS LIKE :recStatus>> <<AND EBSP_IS_SITE LIKE :ebspIsSite>> <<AND EBSP_SITE_CODE LIKE :ebspSiteCode>> <<AND EBSP_SITE_NAME LIKE :ebspSiteName>> <<AND EBSP_TYPE LIKE :ebspType>> <<AND EBSP_BRANCH_CODE LIKE :ebspBranchCode>> <<AND EBSP_BRANCH_NAME LIKE :ebspBranchName>> <<AND EBSP_UPSTREAM_CODE LIKE :ebspUpstreamCode>> <<AND EBSP_UPSTREAM_DETAIL_ADDRESS LIKE :ebspUpstreamDetailAddress>> <<AND EDI_STATUS LIKE :ediStatus>> <<AND COMPANY_CODE LIKE :companyCode>> <<AND SITE_CODE LIKE :siteCode>> <<AND EBSP_IS_CONSIGNOR = :ebspIsConsignor>> ${queryPlanDefinedSql} ${queryPlanSortSql}
